title: Infinite recursion getattr
body:
While trying to run any `spack` command, I get an error about maximum recursion. It looks like `getattr` is calling itself in one of the Python classes.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ source $SPACK_ROOT/share/spack/setup-env.sh
```

### Error Message

